title: T206, 7 left, from G- to VG-EX+ with individual prices

posts.post_title: T206, 7 left, from G- to VG-EX+ with individual prices
posts.post_content:
Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [No pm's, please; my pm box is constantly full].
Ppff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [No messages on ppff; thanks] or personal check; regular paypal, add 3%.

First to say he'll take it gets it.  Add $1 for S/H.
Note on scans: As the page turns, the backs are in reverse order.

Scan 1: 
Street catching [VG-Ex or better], $33--
Bescher, --TRADED--
Burchell [VG?--no obvious creases], $29--

--These 5, in the G- to G+ range, for $100, delivered:

I've given group prices.  I'll sell individually; ask me for a price.  Discounts on bundles.

--SOLD--The 3 Old Mills--O'Leary, Gasper, McCormick--are all Poor; all 3 for [STRIKE]$60[/STRIKE] $55 delivered.--SOLD--
